# diary post

Well, folks, **we are back to standard time**. My joyous time shooting at F16 is *out the window*, and now I must resort to metaphorically popping people. **The flash is all I have**, and thus, I have shifted from street journalism to street landscapes. Check out some of my work below! I have been shooting an absurd amount of film, but *thankfully*, I develop my film at the [soil factory](https://www.thesoilfactory.org/) and scan the negatives with a flatbed scanner in mann library on the weekends!
